name: tv
description: Interactive debug console plugin for hapi

scripts.test: mocha-phantomjs -p node_modules/.bin/phantomjs test/client/index.html --hooks test/client/phantomHooks.js && lab test/index.js -a code --leaks
scripts.test-lint: mocha-phantomjs -p node_modules/.bin/phantomjs test/client/index.html --hooks test/client/phantomHooks.js && lab test/index.js -a code -t 100 -L --leaks
scripts.test-client-cov: npm run test && istanbul report --root coverage lcov
scripts.watch: npm run build && npm run watch-js & npm run watch-test & npm run watch-styles & npm run post-js
scripts.build-test: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -t hbsfy -t [ browserify-istanbul --ignore **/*.hbs ] test/client/main.js -o test/bundle.js
scripts.build: npm run build-js && npm run build-styles && npm run build-test && npm run copy-fonts && npm run copy-assets
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run boot
scripts.start-dev: npm run watch & npm run boot
scripts.post-js: WATCH=true onchange test/bundle.js -w -d 1000 -- npm run test
